metaDescription: Discover LIFE MEDITERRANEA in Algorfa, Alicante. Premium 3-bedroom villas from €579,000 by THE FILM GROUP SPAIN. On-site golf, delivered December 2026.

content.heroIntro: LIFE MEDITERRANEA represents the pinnacle of modern villa living in La Finca Golf, Algorfa. Developed by the trusted and experienced THE FILM GROUP SPAIN, this exclusive collection of 3-bedroom villas combines Mediterranean elegance with contemporary design, starting from just €579,000. Each property spans 118m² of built space on a generous 442m² plot, offering the perfect balance between comfort and outdoor living. Scheduled for completion on 01-12-2026, LIFE MEDITERRANEA provides an exceptional opportunity to invest in one of Costa Blanca's most sought-after golf communities. The development attracts an international clientele who appreciate proximity to championship golf courses, pristine beaches, and modern amenities, all while enjoying a peaceful, secure residential environment. THE FILM GROUP SPAIN's commitment to quality construction and attention to detail ensures these villas will be cherished homes or sound investment properties for years to come. With values appreciating at 12% year-on-year and rental potential of €900 per week, LIFE MEDITERRANEA offers compelling reasons to buy now in this thriving Algorfa location.

locationSection.intro: La Finca Golf in Algorfa is a premier residential destination on the Costa Blanca, renowned for its championship golf course and exclusive community atmosphere. This well-established area combines the tranquility of a golf resort with convenient access to essential services, making it ideal for both full-time residents and holiday homeowners. Algorfa itself is a charming village that has maintained its authentic character while welcoming an international community, particularly golf enthusiasts and retirees seeking a relaxed Mediterranean lifestyle. The location benefits from excellent connectivity to major amenities, with Hospital de Torrevieja just 20 minutes away, beautiful Guardamar beaches within 15 minutes, and quality shopping at Mercadona in nearby Rojales just 10 minutes away. English is widely spoken throughout the resort due to the large expat community, ensuring ease of communication and integration. The area's 50% price advantage compared to coastal towns makes it an exceptional value proposition while delivering the same Mediterranean sun, culture, and natural beauty.

content.investmentSection: LIFE MEDITERRANEA represents a sound investment opportunity in one of Costa Blanca's most dynamic markets. Property values in Algorfa are appreciating at 12% year-on-year, significantly outpacing broader European real estate trends. The development's positioning within the prestigious La Finca Golf community attracts serious international buyers, creating strong rental demand. Short-term vacation rentals command €900 per week, while long-term tenancy provides stable income streams. Remarkably, properties at LIFE MEDITERRANEA are priced at approximately 50% less than comparable properties in coastal towns like Torrevieja, offering exceptional value without compromising on lifestyle or amenities. This price differential, combined with positive market momentum and rental potential, makes LIFE MEDITERRANEA an attractive proposition for both owner-occupiers seeking a primary residence or holiday retreat, and investors seeking capital appreciation and rental returns. THE FILM GROUP SPAIN's established reputation and completed projects throughout the region further enhance investor confidence in the development's quality and completion reliability.

faqs.question: Is Algorfa a good place to live?
faqs.answer: Yes, Algorfa is an excellent place to live. It features an international golf community where English is widely spoken, property values appreciate at 12% year-on-year, and amenities include Hospital de Torrevieja (20 min), Guardamar beaches (15 min), and La Finca Golf on-site. faqs.answer: LIFE MEDITERRANEA is just 15 minutes from Guardamar beaches and 20 minutes from La Mata. These beautiful sandy beaches are easily accessible for daily visits or weekend retreats while maintaining the peaceful, secure environment of the golf resort.

faqs.question: What amenities are near LIFE MEDITERRANEA?
